ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Sisters in OOT ... From: Trizzen Do Trevan  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com  Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Sisters in OOT
-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 9:59 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>I am a level 16 necromancer, and I am completely
>broke. As of last night, I am worth 3pp and some
>change. Could you all please give me some ideas on
>getting money? Killing wisps is extremely boring to me
>since they take forever to track down, don't get exp,
>and with my luck I get a non-burned out lightstone
>once out of 10 times. Lavastorm is boring too since
>that is where i spent level 10-12, and dervishes are
>the same story since that was 12-14.
>
>Any ideas, please? :)
>
>Darkmoon 16th circle necromancer.
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
